meanings.definition: Showing the most boldness or audacity
meanings.sent1: She was the brassiest student in class, always speaking her mind.
meanings.sent2: The brassiest member of the team volunteered to lead the project.
meanings.sent3: The brassiest squirrel in the park fearlessly stole snacks from picnickers.
meanings.sent4: His brassiest move was challenging the principal to a dance-off.
meanings.sent5: The brassiest peacock strutted around the garden, demanding attention.

meanings.definition: Having the most prominent brass color
meanings.sent1: The brassiest trumpet in the band gleamed under the stage lights.
meanings.sent2: Her necklace was the brassiest accessory she owned, shining brightly.
meanings.sent3: The brassiest doorknob in the house always caught the sunlight, blinding visitors.
meanings.sent4: The brassiest statue in the park stood out among the greenery, a beacon of elegance.
meanings.sent5: The brassiest bell in the church rang out with a rich, golden tone.

meanings.definition: Making the most noise or being the loudest
meanings.sent1: The brassiest car in the street woke up the entire neighborhood with its honking.
meanings.sent2: Her laughter was the brassiest at the party, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent3: The brassiest alarm clock in the house never failed to startle the cat.
meanings.sent4: The brassiest thunderstorm of the year rumbled through the night, shaking windows.
meanings.sent5: The brassiest fireworks display lit up the sky with a symphony of colors.
